title: Interpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream. The teacher of interpretation of visions in Islam is one of the comprehensive Islamic religious sciences that has rules and regulations derived from the Holy Qur’an and the Noble Prophet’s Sunnah. However, it is one of the sciences that has not been recognized academically and scientifically. It is not taught in schools, institutes, universities and graduate colleges, although it aims to explain the interpretation of visions in Islam, and the vision that comes from God Almighty and has many meanings and interpretations that can benefit the individual and society in religious and worldly matters, which is known as the true or righteous vision.Interpretation Seeing the Virgin Mary Seeing the Virgin in a dream is one of the things that raises controversy and curiosity about the meaning of this dream, and in this regard some are interested in searching for an interpretation of seeing the Virgin in a dream, as this dream indicates. With comfort, joy, and happy news to get rid of worries, troubles, and problems, make things easier, and alleviate our needs with ease and ease, God willing, and seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream indicates that the dreamer will maintain various acts of obedience and worship, and it also indicates the husband’s great love and devotion and the fear of God in the wife. Seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream About his legs: Many men are interested in searching for the best and most accurate interpretation of seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream for a man, because he was married to him. Of money and procreation, all of this is that of Almighty God, and seeing the Virgin Mary in a dream shows the sincerity, love and devotion of his wife to the husband, her abundant kindness and great benefit, and that God Almighty. She will give birth to a good and successful one, God willing. Interpretation of Surah Maryam in a dream for a married woman. The Holy Qur’an is the word of God Almighty, revealed to our master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, by the revelation of Gabriel, and it is a divine constitution on earth from which people learn the foundations of religion and jurisprudence. This indicates the stability of her family, family, and marital life, and her husband’s involvement in realizing dreams and aspirations in the near future. Also, seeing Surat Maryam in a dream shows great interest in her children, their good upbringing, and their success in that. Life.Interpretation of a dream about the name Maryam for a divorced woman. There are many basic general rules and principles that dream interpreters must follow, the most important of which is interpretation through the Holy Qur’an, the noble Prophetic hadiths, and interpretation with the similarity of nouns, forms, adverbs, verbs, antonyms, antonyms, and character. The importance with increase and decrease for a divorced woman, as the name Maryam indicates the significance of promotion in the dreamer’s current job and obtaining a higher rank, and a higher position with name and fame. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing grandfather and grandmother according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing Jesus in a dream after talking about the interpretation of a dream about seeing Virgin Mary in a dream, we had to get acquainted with the interpretation of the dream of seeing the Lord Jesus Christ, the son of Mary. Not for him, but if the dreamer disobeys God, this indicates a good punishment for him because the Prophet Jesus, peace be upon him, descended from heaven at the end of time to rid the world of the Antichrist and fill the earth with justice. And kindness. Seeing the nickname

title: Interpretation of seeing a lupine in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing lupine in a dream by Ibn Sirin: If someone sees a green lupine in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer will achieve great financial wealth after hard work, effort, and hard work. And if a person sees in a dream, dried lupine, this is an indication that he feels uncomfortable, stressed, and anxious and is suffering. Also from illness. Seeing boiled lupine in a dream indicates that the dreamer will have a lot of money and a very spacious living in the near future. If one sees in a dream that he is eating boiled lupine, this is a sign of very good things that the dreamer will have in his next life. If he dreams If a person is eating a lupine that has been soaked for a period of time and the dreamer falls ill, then this vision indicates that he will recover soon, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about eating a yellow lupine in a dream: To see yourself eating a yellow lupine means good luck and good news that will reach the fortuneteller. And if a person sees in his dream that he is offering it to people Yellow lupine This is an indication that there are many positive changes in the life of the fortuneteller. Seeing a yellow lupine in a dream means that you will get money, but after fatigue and hardship. Interpretation of seeing a lupine distributed in a dream If one sees in a dream he is distributing hot to people, this is a sign of Happy news and the fulfillment of a cherished wish for the one who has the vision. It also indicates the increase in profits that the viewer will receive if he engages in trade. If an unmarried girl sees that she is sharing a thermos, this is a sign that she is about to become involved with a suitable person for her. As for the pregnant woman who sees that she She distributes a lupine in her dream, this is an indication that she will give birth soon and it will be an easy and smooth birth, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of a lupine in water If anyone sees a lupine soaked in water in a dream, this is a sign of a happy event that will happen in his life and change it for the better. This vision indicates an increase in the dreamer’s livelihood and the extent of His condition. But if one sees in a dream that he is eating lupine before soaking it in water, this may be a sign of problems and quarrels in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about eating yellow lupine for a single woman. If a girl sees that she is eating boiled yellow lupine, this is a good vision and indicates that she will overcome many problems. The difficulties that she will face in her life and she will reach a prominent social status. It also indicates that she will achieve great financial wealth from her hard work and toil. Seeing yellow lupine in a person’s dream generally indicates success, excellence, and achieving goals. Interpretation of seeing eating yellow lupine in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing lupine in The dream indicates to a pregnant woman that she will be in good health and have an easy birth, and that her baby will be healthy, of sound mind and body, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is eating a bitter lupine, this is a sign that she will give birth to a son, and God knows best. But if she dreams that she is eating a sweet lupine, this is a sign that she will have a daughter, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a lupine for Nabul: Seeing a green lupine means money that the fortuneteller will receive, but after fatigue. Seeing someone in a dream with a dry lupine means sadness and anxiety.

title: Interpretation of the dream of success in graduation by Ibn Sirin is the most accurate interpretation

preview.html: You are reading this article now because you certainly dreamed last night that you are taking the graduation exam, either you are taking the test or you are struggling to reach the testing center or in the end the results of the exam are in your hands and many other events, so this article provides the Encyclopedia website’s interpretation of the dream of success in graduation everything About this dream. Interpretation of the dream of success in graduation. Psychological research and studies have shown that more than 20% of people dream of graduation results. After completing it for 10 to 15 years, this dream stays with them in every period of their life. And if you are in this percentage, it means that you are a person You are still stuck in one of the fears of the past. Perhaps it is your fear of failure and others who put you under a lot of pressure that has caused you deep psychological problems. You ignore these problems and move forward, but that does not mean that you have not abandoned the obsessions of the past. And here you have to be Be brave and get rid of these fears, then repeating this dream probably means that it is the right time. Regarding the interpretation of seeing success in the baccalaureate level, those who are already in the graduation stage. This is considered normal because students at this time always aspire to obtain the highest grades. Thus desire, hope and ambition create anxiety that It generates these dreams. Therefore, this means that the dream is nothing but the translation of feelings into the subconscious. So, passing or failing the exam is just additional pressure, so there is no need to be afraid. All you have to do is do whatever it takes to study to get the grades you want In the exam. Since then, you do not have to worry at all about these dreams so that they do not affect your activity and energy. Did you know that any person in his life takes more than 120 tests during his school days. These tests do not have the same effect on us, there are those who do not care And there are also those who are afraid of it. So, the interpretation of a dream about passing exams is after feeling panic and fear. This means that you will be able to achieve all your goals in life, but it also means that you are a responsible person. You always take all your responsibilities seriously and this is what always makes you successful. But you must be careful that this excessive attention does not harm your health, because it is the most valuable thing you have. But if you see success and you are a person who does not really care, it means that even though you do not take life seriously. But in the end, you reach the place where You want to be in it and what you want always happens. You are provided with the peace of mind that many seek and strive to achieve. Interpretation of a dream about success in graduation for a girl: One night the girl sleeps and sees in her dream that she will take her graduation exams. But there are many obstacles in her way, and when She realized her destination. There was not enough time to complete the test. But in the end, after the results appeared, he found that he passed with high marks. This dream means the following: At a certain stage in this girl’s life, she will suffer from difficulty in finding a life partner. There will be a lot of pressure on her. , but there will always be obstacles

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about magic from Ibn Sirin’s relatives

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about magic from relatives has many associations and meanings for dreamers and makes them very passionate about learning about them, and in the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this topic that our distinguished scholars provide us. Let's read the following. Interpretation of a dream about witchcraft by relatives. Seeing in a dream about witchcraft by relatives indicates many wrong things that he is doing, which will lead to serious death if he does not stop it immediately. If one sees in his dream witchcraft by relatives, then this A sign of great negligence that prevents him from achieving many events, and he must be more aware and careful in his actions. In the event that the dreamer watches the magic of his relatives in his sleep, this expresses bad events that will occur in his life and bother him a lot. The dreamer who watches in a dream the magic of relatives It symbolizes the bad qualities that he knows and causes alienation from everyone around him. Interpretation of dreams about witchcraft by relatives by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s dream of witchcraft by relatives as a sign of the many disputes that occur between family members and make the situation between them very turbulent. If one sees If the dreamer sees magic from relatives in his dream, this is a sign that he is being harmed all the time by the people closest to his heart and this makes him very sad. In the event that the dreamer witnesses the magic of relatives in his sleep, this expresses that he is doing many shameful and wrong matters that will cause In his death if he does not stop it immediately. The dreamer who witnesses witchcraft from his relatives indicates his weakness in the rights of his family members to a great extent and his lack of interest in asking about their conditions. Interpretation of a dream about witchcraft from relatives to single people. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that her relatives have been witchcraft and buried her in her house, then this A sign of her unacceptable actions, and she must review herself immediately. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is trying to break the spell on relatives, this expresses her liberation from the problems that disturbed her life in the previous days. The dreamer seeing in her dream that one of her relatives wants to perform a spell on her It symbolizes that she will fall into a big problem that she will not be able to get rid of easily. A girl’s dream of witchcraft from relatives is evidence of the many problems and disagreements that prevail in her relationship with her family and prevent her from strengthening her relationship with them. Interpretation of a dream about witchcraft by relatives for a married woman. A married woman who sees in a dream the witchcraft of relatives under her doorstep. An indication that there are illegal things that her husband is doing at his work, and despite her knowledge of this matter, she does not take any position against him. If the dreamer sees witchcraft from relatives during his sleep and tries to decode it, this is a sign that he will be able to get rid of the things that caused the unhappiness. Her relief and she will be more comfortable after that. If the dreamer sees witchcraft from relatives in her dream, this expresses the presence of people in her life who conflict with her in her dealings with them, as they show friendliness and the exact opposite in themselves. A woman’s dream of witchcraft from relatives symbolizes that she treats everyone around her with extreme faith. Which makes it vulnerable to...

title: Learn about henna on the hands of the dead in a dream on the authority of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Henna on the hand of the dead person in a dream. Interpreters believe that the dream indicates the goodness and justice of the dead person in the afterlife, but it carries some bad interpretations that depend on the details of the dream and the color and shape of the henna. Henna on the hand of the dead person in a dream by Ibn SirinHenna on the hand of the dead person in the dream indicates that the dreamer will soon enjoy comfort. Peace and tranquility after a long period of stress and fatigue. The dream also indicates the end of the problems and difficulties that he is going through in the current period. If the deceased was a good man, and known for his good behavior among people, then seeing him in a dream means that God Almighty will bless the dreamer in his life and succeed in any endeavor. A job he does. During. If the dreamer sees henna drawn on the hand of the deceased in an organized and coordinated manner, this indicates a good stay of the deceased in the afterlife due to the good deeds he performed in his life. In the event that the henna design is drawn in a bad and disorganized manner, it will lead to a poor condition of the deceased later because of His negligence in performing his religious duties in his life and the dream urges the dreamer to pray for him often for mercy and forgiveness. Perhaps the Lord will accept his prayer and forgive the dead person for his sins. Henna on the hand of the dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If the dreamer is going through a certain crisis in the current period, then the vision indicates that he will emerge from it soon. His stress will end and his happy days in life will begin. If the dreamer sees the deceased putting henna on his hands and hair in a dream, the dream indicates that the dreamer is going through a bad psychological state and that many negative thoughts happen to him all the time, but this problem will end only if he deals with An activity he loves, practicing sports, or learning a new hobby that occupies his thoughts and renews his energy. If the dreamer sees a dead person whom he knows drawing henna on his hands and on certain parts of his body, then the dream indicates getting rid of the physical pain that the dreamer feels and restoring his usual activity after a long period. From exhaustion. Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Henna on the hand of the dead person in a dream for unmarried women. The vision symbolizes happy events and circumstances, as well as many positive developments that will occur in the life of Single people in the near future. If the dreamer sees henna on the hands of her deceased father in a dream, this indicates his satisfaction with her and his pride in this last period of his life, because she was a good daughter and a pious father. The right decision that benefits her life and satisfies her family. It is said that the dream indicates the imminent marriage of the visionary to a successful and ambitious young man who loves his work very much and wants to reach a high position in his work. The dream shows that she will be happy with him and he will encourage her. To pursue her goals and achieve her ambitions. Henna on the hand of a dead person in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation scholars believe that the dream bodes well because it shows the joy and happiness that will soon knock on the dreamer’s door and also symbolizes a pleasant event that will happen to her soon. The vision shows many wonderful things that

title: A simplified explanation of the periodic table lesson 2021

preview.html: Study the periodic table of elements for important and fun chemistry courses. The periodic table contains many different advantages and characteristics to explain the lesson on the periodic table. Explanation of the lesson on the periodic table. The periodic table is a table of the known chemical elements, which number 118, of which 92 exist in nature, while the remaining elements were prepared in the laboratory, and this table is made or arranged according to the number Atomic element. The electronic configuration and similar chemical properties of each group of elements. In general, the elements on the left are metals and the nonmetals on the right. Where elements with similar chemical behavior are placed in the same column. The periodic table is divided into rows and columns, called periods, and columns by groups. In the periodic table there are six groups that have distinct names other than the number assigned to them. For example, the elements in group number 18 in the periodic table are known as (noble gases) and the elements in group 17 are known as (halogens). There are also some sublevels associated with filling the orbitals. Atomicity. Russian chemist Dmitri Mendeleev was the first to draw up a periodic table of the elements and publish it in 1869. This table was subsequently developed several times based on Mendeleev's predictions, most of which turned out to be correct, and the periodic table was expanded. By discovering or inventing new elements. The development of the periodic table. As we mentioned, the first periodic table was published in 1869 and published by the scientist (Mendeleev). Mendeleev's table contained only 63 elements arranged according to their atomic weights, but he (Mendeleev) left some gaps in his table, waiting for the discovery of other chemical elements, and determined the chemical properties of the elements in those gaps. Amazingly, these predictions were correct and were discovered several years later From Mendeleev's program. There were also many attempts to list the known elements before the appearance of Mendeleev, the first of which was made by the Frenchman Lavoisier, then followed by Dalton, who classified the elements using their atomic mass. Many developments were made in the periodic table after Mendeleev until the scientist (Morley) arranged the elements in the table according to number The atomic number of each chemical element. It remained this way until the periodic table was developed into its modern form, and the elements on it were arranged by atomic number and electron-filled energy levels for each element. The elements were divided into 18 groups, ranging from left to right and from top to bottom, and the atomic number of each element gradually increased. At the bottom of the table there are two groups of elements divided into two rows, each row containing 14 elements. These elements are called (transition elements) and they are very similar in chemical properties, and are difficult to separate if mixed together. The first series is known as the lanthanides and the second series is called the actinides. The periodic table begins with hydrogen, with atomic number 1, and ends with eugene, which has atomic number 118. Uses of Table D

title: Seeing eating peanuts in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of buying peanuts in a dream? All of this is explained in all cases, whether single or married, a man, a pregnant woman, or a bachelor. Interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a girl in a dream with peanuts in large quantities. A promising vision indicates that the emotional stage It will pass in reality. It is evidence of the happy life that she will enjoy, God willing. Peanuts in a dream for an unmarried girl are good and plentiful food, God willing. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream shelling peanuts. This means hard and tiring work for her in the coming days. But you will pass this stage and enjoy comfort and stability, God willing. Peanuts in a single girl’s dream means goodness and will change her situation for the better. They will enjoy security and will not be harmed, God willing. Seeing peanuts in a single girl’s dream is evidence of her success in study and her excellence in the field of work and science. Also, Peanuts herald self-confidence and abundant food, God willing. When an unmarried girl buys peanuts in a dream, this means that she will earn halal money, God willing, and will enjoy the righteousness and purity of her heart. Peanuts in a dream for an unmarried girl means that she will have beautiful and clear skin. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dreamInterpretation of a vision of eating peanuts in a dream for a married womanSeeing a married woman in a dream with peanuts. A very promising vision and may God bless her and her family with happiness, God willing. Peanuts in a married woman’s dream indicate psychological comfort. And contentment. It indicates happiness, the end of her troubles and worries, and her closeness to God Almighty. Seeing a married woman in her dream eating peanuts and shelling them for a small child. This means her ability to carry her children and her husband. The appearance of a child in a dream is evidence of the validity of its religious conditions. When a married woman sees herself in a dream Shelling peanuts for her husband. Good news for her marital bliss, and for her to feel comfortable and stable with him. When she dreams of a married woman shelling a large amount of peanuts. Evidence of earning and a lot of money for the husband, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about eating peanuts in a dream for a man and its meaning. Peanuts in a man’s dream indicate On profit and lawful profit. Or will he obtain a high position in his field of work, God willing. If he is not working, then the vision indicates that he will get a new job, God willing. A man in his dream was eating peanuts with many visions worthy of praise. As it indicates an abundance of goodness. And abundance in livelihood, God willing. When a man buys peanuts in large quantities in his dream, it is evidence of his ability to achieve all his desires in reality, God willing, but after a great effort on his part. Peanuts in a man’s dream means that he will be happy with happy news and achieve family and social stability, God willing. God. Peanuts in a dream indicate blessings and a lot of money from God. Read also: Seeing peanuts in a dream, meaning of a dream about eating peanuts in a dream.

title: Learn about the interpretation of the dream of begging and its implications

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about supplication: It is one of the interpretations that many scholars have paid attention to in their interpretation books. The interpretation of supplication in a dream varies depending on the viewer, whether he is male, female, married, etc. Therefore, today through this article, we will learn about many of the sayings of scholars and interpreters who specialize in the interpretation of dreams, especially in the interpretation of supplication in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of supplication What is the interpretation of a dream of begging? The beginning In a dream, it is evidence of the fulfillment of the dreamer’s prayer and the satisfaction of his needs. It also indicates pleasure, and seeing it in a dream indicates the release of anxiety and distress that dominate the dreamer’s life, whether he is a man. Or a woman, but whoever finds himself praying for himself in a dream, this is evidence that he will soon be blessed with good offspring who will help him in life’s difficulties and help him and support him in this world. What is the interpretation of a dream about prayer by Ibn Sirin? Whoever sees in his dream that he is calling upon God and asking Him for a command This indicates the goodness and closeness of the servant to his Lord, and if the dreamer is disobedient, this indicates his guidance. Supplication in a dream is evidence of the existence of many wishes belonging to the dreamer, and he begs God to fulfill them to the extent that he begs his Lord in the state of wakefulness as well as during his sleep. Whoever it is In his dream, many people prayed to God, so this is evidence that he will get rid of troubles and problems in life and will soon solve the problems he faces. You have a dream that confuses you, wait for it.. Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. Interpretation of a dream about praying for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman praying in a dream is... Promising things that indicate goodness, blessing, and a lot of sustenance that she will receive in this world, and it also indicates that she will achieve her dreams. If an unmarried woman sees her mother praying for her in a dream, this is evidence of her mother’s intense love for her in this world. Interpretation of a dream about praying for a woman The Married Woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is pleading with God, this indicates the completion of marital problems, and that God will provide her with good offspring who will help her in life’s affairs. If she sees that she is praying for her husband, this indicates the extent of her love for him and her sincerity. Interpretation of the dream about praying in the name of God, who His name does not harm anything. Whoever sees in his dream that he speaks in the name of God, whose name does not harm anything on earth or in heaven, this indicates relief from the stress, anxiety, pain, and problems that the dreamer is going through. Life is one of the supplications said in legal ruqyah to protect oneself and insects.

title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing dry land in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see the earth drying in a dream in detail, to clarify the earth and the interpretation of seeing the earth drying for a pregnant married woman, a single woman, and a man, according to prominent Arab interpreters and scholars. Cleaning the earth with water and drying it is one of the customs that people practice, but does seeing the earth dry in a dream have implications for good or evil? This will now be known through the interpretation of a dream about drying the earth in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about drying the earth for a single woman: The interpretation of a dream about the earth drying up in a dream for a single girl is only evidence that she has new ideas and is thinking about them. But if he sees that that part of the earth has dried This indicates that he will obtain a portion of the money, in addition to achieving some of the goals that he is pursuing. Seeing the floor dry with clean water is evidence of the disappearance of fears and sorrows and the elimination of the problems that you are experiencing. Interpretation of seeing the floor drying for a married woman: Seeing the kitchen floor drying in a dream For a married woman, this is evidence of her good relationship with her husband. Seeing the sink and the bathroom drain in a married woman’s dream indicates comfort and distress. The interpretation of seeing the earth drying in a dream for a married woman indicates the happiness she lives with her husband. As for seeing a married woman who is unable to dry the earth, this indicates temptation. Marriage, and she should be careful. Interpretation of a vision of the floor drying for a pregnant woman: Interpretation of the floor drying in a dream for a pregnant woman and standing while cleaning and drying it on the floor, and this indicates the safety of her and her fetus and her health and safety. Drying the floor in a room in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of the approaching date of her birth. Interpretation of the floor drying indicates In a dream while sitting also to the next date of birth and you need to prepare for that. If a pregnant woman sees that she cannot dry the floor, this indicates a disturbance in labor and the passage of many problems during childbirth. A pregnant woman who sees that it is time to clean and dry the floor has lost her fetus. . In fact, her fetus will actually be lost. Interpretation of the vision of the earth drying up for a person: The interpretation of the earth drying up in a person’s dream is evidence of his purity and the high position he will achieve in society. Drying the earth with clean water in a man’s dream indicates an improvement in his physical condition for the better.
